577220.name: Animal Lover - Original Soundtrack
577220.description:
The soundtrack for Animal Lover by Wilson Taylor, Maia Gross and Travis Tohill!

Included are 14 tracks by:

Aaron "Honeybear" Meyer
Kris "FRO.DOE" Anderson
Ivan "Iviqrr" Subotičanec
Wilson Taylor

Track Listing:

Human Contact - FRO.DOE
A Little Big, A Little Scary - Honeybear
Need To Know Basis (Edmund's Theme) - Honeybear
Businessperson (Frankie's Theme) - FRO.DOE
Party Up, Republicrats! (Kyle's Theme) - FRO.DOE
I Never Did (Miguel's Theme) - Honeybear
A Modern Man (Charlie's Theme) - FRO.DOE
Mystic Wonder - FRO.DOE
Crayons - Wilson Taylor
Expectations - Honeybear
Rapture - Iviqrr
Bottom Over Top - Honeybear
Lullaby For The Dead - Iviqrr
Human Contact (Reprise) - Wilson Taylor

NOTE: When purchased, the music files will be available within the game's SteamApps folder.
577220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
